extendedInfo.description: This Live Wallpaper is FREEAfter you have downloaded and installed, it is necessary to set as wallpaper Live:- Go to the home screen;- Press the menu button on the device;- Select "Wallpaper";- Select "Live Wallpapers";- Search for and select the Live Desktop "- Select "Settings" to see the settings, or select "Set Wallpaper" to activate it.switch to SD is available, all supported screen resolution.Also you can adjust the speed of the Live Wallpaper : by going to settingsSome info regards ads into this appWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep the app 100% free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app. (Drag & Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from:Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutTags:Beautiful White Horse Live wallpapers Sky blue white glitter flower pink
